name: Σθενώ
description:
Sthenno is the oldest of the three mythological Gorgon sisters and means forceful, ‘the strong one’.
The Re-veil collection, a collaboration between The Fabricant x Trs.Mnz, reimagines the Greek myth of feminine danger and shows Sthenno as a symbol of fearless self-expression by referencing a 15th century European headdress and a modern bucket hat. The scarf features a poem by multidisciplinary artist Sarafina. The owner will be able to wear the headpiece with a DressX code.
